name: Guardian of the Jungle
description:
The Yanomami, like many other indigenous communities in the Amazon, are the protectors of the jungle and the life in it. They have been resisting for years being displaced from their territory mainly due to mining and livestock. They do not have real protection from any government.

“Our land has to be respected. Our land is our heritage, a heritage that protects us " Davi Kopenawa Yanomami Shaman.
